metadata.title: CVE-2021-47473 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: qla2xxx: Fix a memory leak in an error path of qla2x00_process_els()Commit 8c0eb596baa5 ("[SCSI] qla2xxx: Fix a memory leak in an error path ofqla2x00_process_els()"), intended to change:        bsg_job->request->msgcode == FC_BSG_HST_ELS_NOLOGIN        bsg_job->request->msgcode != FC_BSG_RPT_ELSbut changed it to:        bsg_job->request->msgcode == FC_BSG_RPT_ELSinstead.Change the == to a != to avoid leaking the fcport structure or freeingunallocated memory.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
